After lui   x1, 0xFEDCC:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0xFEDCC000
x 2 = 0x00000000
x 3 = 0x00000000
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000

x11 = 0x00000000
x12 = 0x00000000
x13 = 0x00000000
